Title: Prohibits the purchase of single-use plastic products by state agencies
Summary: Prohibits the purchase of single-use plastic products by state agencies, first limiting purchases to be used at any event, briefing, or meeting hosted or sponsored by a state agency in 2030, and a complete prohibition beginning in 2035.
LawCode: Amd ยง165, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to prohibiting the purchase of single-use plastic products by state agencies
